signup_login.name: Account Creation & Login
steps: Verify authentication by checking for profile dropdown or user avatar
⚠️ Profile dropdown not found, checking URL

favorites.name: Favorites Test
steps: Navigate to /movies to find a different movie
⚠️ Could not find second movie, using first movie
Click 'Add to Favorites' button again (test idempotency)

collections.name: Collections Test
steps: Wait for collections page to load
Button not found with standard selectors, trying alternative selectors
errors: Create collection button not found - page may not have loaded properly

profile.name: Profile Test
steps: Verify Overview tab shows watchlist preview
